name: Find The Bicycle Alpha 1*Early Access*
description:
You need to look around the map and find the bicycle. Currently only two maps, will update the game and release the full game soon.

W A S D or Arrow keys to move.

If you fall of the map, restart the game.

Bugs will be fixed

This is my first ever 3D game and I was happy so I decided to release a demo

Update!

I have cancelled the making of this game, if lots of people like it I will start making the game again but for now I have cancelled it. This was made in copper cube which is an amazing engine but you can do anything with a click of a button which is good but I want to learn how to program so I moved on to unity. I have been learning unity and its amazing, I will publish a game here after a while.

Enjoy:)
